title: Looking to trade m116 Jennings for a t206 or m101-4 hofer
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking to trade m116 Jennings for a t206 or m101-4 hofer
posts.post_content:
Got a decent looking m116 sporting life Hughie jennings i am looking to trade for a t206 hofer or m101-4 hofer or cub
As far as t206 hofers are concerned i really want:
Jennings close up
Bender trees showing
Baker
Chance portrait
Tinker portrait

But Im not too picky, lets trade! :)
